block.p: It's nice that WordPerfect recognizes text written in other word processing programs, like Microsoft Word. Too bad we can't say the same thing about Microsoft programs' recognizing earlier Microsoft products. When switching to Windows 98, I found that Microsoft's previous word processing program in Microsoft Works was only partly accepted. Now when I open one of the old Works files, I get a message that says, ''Cannot load conversion files.'' Maybe I've got to change religions.
